definition: A day of the week that typically follows Sunday and precedes Tuesday, often associated with the beginning of the workweek and the end of the weekend.

examples.german: Montag ist der erste Tag der Woche.
examples.english: Monday is the first day of the week.
I have a day off on Monday.

examples.german: Wir treffen uns am Montag um 9 Uhr.
examples.english: We are meeting on Monday at 9 o'clock.
On Monday evening, I'm going to the cinema.
